title.rendered: Article: Blockchain mortgages, touted for real estate investors, get thumbs-down on security concerns

content.rendered:
In this Financial Post article, VINE Group Founding Partner and Mortgage Agent, David Goncalves comments on blockchain mortgages; the highly speculative, higher-risk transactions similar to syndicated mortgages.

Source: Financial Post

excerpt.rendered: In this Financial Post article, VINE Group Founding Partner and Mortgage Agent, David Goncalves comments on blockchain mortgages; the highly speculative, higher-risk transactions similar to syndicated mortgages. Source: Financial Post
